column1: The Purple Pig////Crispy Pigs Ear-This seems to be a very popular dish. It's served with salty crispy pigs ear
column3: and pickled banana peppers and topped with a fried egg. You must break the yolk so it serves as a dressing to the pigs ear and mix it all together. If you just eat the pigs ear by itself
column4: it will be too salty. The egg
column5: kale and banana peppers helps balance all the flavors. Not sure if I'd get this again though.
